summary:
Adobe is an American software company that makes tools for creating digital content. It was founded in 1982 by John Warnock and Charles Geschke. They started by developing PostScript, a language for printing text and images. Adobe's popular products include Photoshop for photo editing, Illustrator for drawing, and Acrobat for creating PDF files.

Over time, Adobe expanded into video editing, web design, and digital marketing. It offers these tools as a subscription service called Creative Cloud. Adobe has many employees worldwide and is known for its creative software, but has faced criticism for its pricing policies.
title: Adobe Inc.
